title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: two layers of plain weave wool with an interlining of cotton all quilted together with running stitch
description: Corner cut from a quilted bedcover. One side is brown, the other side yellow. Quilted with a design of circular geometric shapes within a diamond lattice.
